name: Ama de Ciencia
description:
Play as a female scientist in the late 19th century as she tries to balance her scientific research with surviving her day to day life.

Manage your daily activites and try to complete your scientific research before it's too late.

Ama de Ciencia was developed in 48 hours for the 2020 ZJam Game Jam, where it won 'Best Game' award..
